title: TEEMO information help
body: Where can I find information regarding the status of teemo's bug fix?  Is there any website anywhere that has any information at all about the progress toward reenabling TEEMO????

replies.body: There is currently a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) notification regarding Teemo being disabled.  Any info and updates will be provided there, so be sure to bookmark it!

I appreciate you taking the time to answer me. I am aware of that status page. I was looking for a time frame or perhaps some information from the bugfix team about their predictions based on what they've found.   I can vouch for the community, we will not abuse his bug if you let us have him back.  RELEASE THE HOSTAGE!
I want to know when {{item:3751}} {{champion:17}}{{item:3751}}   will be enabled so I can go back to murdering people on the rift watching it burn!
